name: TEOT - The End OF Tomorrow
description: IMPORTANT!!! This is a demo prerelease beta version.Game guide:To start Choose the language and level of difficulty using Vive Controller. Direct it to "Enter Virtual Reality" and hard pull the Vive trigger button twice. The game will start when the visual start.In game need to know: Press the grip to hold the gun or dagger.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Any
